review: This app is becoming very problematic... Don't understand what the problem seems to be?? Long load times, lags, freezes, crashes... all I want to do is order some food, and it's problematic. Fees are getting higher and higher; every time they fix a UX issue, a price increase is snuck in somewhere... the fact that the "value meal" can cost upward of $15 on the app, while being under $10 in the store feels like a good way to punish those who have no means to get there themselves...
